subject: Football
Cheating
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. also fined the Patriots $1 million and took away two draft picks because of their use of deflated footballs in the A.F.C. championship game.
snippet: The N.F.L. also fined the Patriots $1 million and took away two draft picks because of their use of deflated footballs in the A.F.C. championship game.
